title: OpticsTurret
description: This element represents a circular holder for multiple optical elements.

subCategoriesOrder.ManufacturerSpec: This describes the Manufacturer specifications for this component (i.e., Manufacturer Name, Model designation and Catalog Number).
subCategoriesOrder.OpticsHolder: This element represents a Holder for Filters, Dichroic and other Optical Element that is associated with this Instrument. These Holders come in different arrangements such as Cubes, Sliders, Turrets, and Wheels. While some of these Holders, such as Filter Cubes, might be pre-assebled by the Manufacturer and pruchased as a whole, in the majority of cases they are assembled on site depending on the needs of the user.
subCategoriesOrder.OpticsTurret: This element represents a circular holder for multiple optical elements.
subCategoriesOrder.Lens: This refers to an available Lens which is part of this Optical Assembly.
subCategoriesOrder.MirroringDevice: This refers to an available Mirroring Device which is part of this Optical Assembly.
subCategoriesOrder.Aperture: This refers to an available Optical Aperture which is part of this Optical Assembly.
subCategoriesOrder.Filter: This empty element refers to any Generic or Neutral Density Filter component placed in this Light Path.
subCategoriesOrder.Prism: This refers to an available Prism which is part of this Optical Assembly.
subCategoriesOrder.PolarizationOptics: This refers to an available Polarization Optics which is part of this Optical Assembly.

Name.description: A User-defined Name for this component.

ID.description: A Unique Identifier for this component.

Motorized.description: This field describes whether this device is Motor (True) or Manually (False) operated.

ResponseTime.description: This field records the time it takes for this Shutter to open and close, according to the Manufacturer.

NrOfSlots.description: This field records how many Slots this Optics Holder has.

Manufacturer.description: This field refers to the company, research group or individual who built or manufactured this hardware component.

Model.description: This field refers to the Model name or any other designation the Manufacturer uses for this component.

CatalogNumber.description: This field records the Catalog, Part or Serial Number used by the Manufacturer to uniquely identify this component.

LotNumber.description: The Lot Number used by the Manufacturer to refer to a specific production batch or lot for this component.

SpecsFile.title: SpecsFile
SpecsFile.description: This element refers to a PDF file that contains the specifications for this hardware component as provided by the Manufacturer.

Description.title: Description
Description.description: This is an empty element that refers to an Annotation (typically a Comment Annotation that consists of a simple multi-line comment) describing this component.
